definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
Wangfujing neighborhood of central Beijing, famous for shopping

sentences.english: AnywITe in Wangfujing Street will be good.
sentences.chinese: 在王府井大街的任何地方都合适。

sentences.english: Before the economic reforms, Beijing's largest department store was the Wangfujing Hundred Goods Emporium.
sentences.chinese: 改革开放以前，北京最大的商店就是王府井百货大楼。

sentences.english: It’s very central. And it’s convenient for the shops on Wangfujing Street.
sentences.chinese: 它在市中心，从那里到王府井大街上的商店非常方便。

sentences.english: Eat the Lian Wang Fu's thing?
Wangfujing is one of the busiest streets in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 王府井是北京最繁华的街道之一。

sentences.english: But Professor Yi Zhongtian is going to sign books at the book store.
sentences.chinese: 易中天教授要在王府井书店签名售书。

sentences.english: B: Yes, I know two bookshops near here, on Wangfujing Street.
sentences.chinese: 有，我知道这附近有两家书店，在王府井大街上。

sentences.english: I walked up and down Wangfujing road and saw that regardless of the nation they represented, visitors were enjoying themselves immensely.
sentences.chinese: 我们多次逛王府井，看见不管哪国人都玩得很开心。

sentences.english: It's very central. And it's convenient for the shops on Wangfujing Street.
sentences.chinese: 它在市中心，从那里到王府井大街上的商店非常方便。

sentences.english: How about that new shopping centre in Wangfujing?
sentences.chinese: 去王府井的那家新购物中心怎么样？

sentences.english: Why not go to Wangfujing Street?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不去逛逛王府井？

sentences.english: Over the king's treasuries was Azmaveth the son of Adiel;
sentences.chinese: 掌管王府库的是亚叠的儿子押斯马威。

sentences.english: Go down Wangfujing to Changan Avenue and it’s on your right.
sentences.chinese: 沿王府井走到长安街，它就在你的右侧。

sentences.english: Today I went to Wangfujing Street.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我去了王府井大街。

sentences.english: Prince Gong House can now visit what?
sentences.chinese: 恭王府现在可以参观么？

sentences.english: With doubts, the reporters found him in the palace of a feudal prince northern suburbs of Beijing apartments.
sentences.chinese: 带着疑惑，记者找到他位于北京北郊的王府公寓。

definition: crown prince/heir of a noble house
